gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Solar wind observations collected from Faraday Cup on DSCOVR satellite - unprocessed, full resolution

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: To monitor solar wind near the L1 point. These data support forecasts and research of phenomena that have the potential to disrupt and damage Earth-based infrastructure.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Dictionary contains listing of all Spase elements and enumerated terms.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Dictionary contains listing of all Spase elements and enumerated terms.

gco:aName.gco:CharacterString: calibration directive HV modulator lower voltage index

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: index of the lower voltage of the HV modulator window (ATBD Table 3.5); each voltage window correlates directly to a proton bulk flow speed
calibration directive exponent (0 = current off, 1 = -14, 2 = -13, 3 = -12, 4 = -11, 5 = -10, 6 = -9)
collector A multiplexor range setting
collector A HV modulation state (0 = on, 1 = off)
calibration directive chain select (0 = apply to all, 1 = only collector chain A, 2 = only chain B, 3 = only chain C)
date and time for each observation
calibration directive multiplier (0 = 3x, 1 = 10x)
calibration directive modulation (0 = off, 1 = on, i.e., in calibration mode)
collector B HV modulation state (0 = on, 1 = off)

gco:aName.gco:CharacterString: collector A analog to digital value

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: collector A analog to digital value

gco:aName.gco:CharacterString: collector B analog to digital value

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: collector B analog to digital value
collector B multiplexor range setting
collector C multiplexor range setting
collector C HV modulation state (0 = on, 1 = off)
One or more measurements were backfilled from the spacecraft recorder and therefore were not available to forecasters in real-time

gco:aName.gco:CharacterString: collector C analog to digital value

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: collector C analog to digital value
One or more measurements were extracted from a packet whose timestamp was older than the threshold at the point of processing
One or more measurements were extracted from a packet whose timestamp was in the future at the point of processing
Loss of proton peak
Fill
Instrument in calibration mode
AOCS non-science mode (spacecraft maneuver/safehold)
Reduced proton data quality; peak identified but resulting science data subject to high uncertainties
Loss of alpha particle peak
Reduced alpha particle data quality; peak identified but resulting science data subject to high uncertainties

gmi:description.gco:CharacterString: Provides real-time measurement of solar wind proton density, speed, velocity, temperature, etc...
Deep Space Climate Observatory is a NOAA Earth observation and space weather satellite stationed at the first Lagrange point (L1).
